#install packages
```{r}
install.packages ("tidyverse", dependencies = TRUE)
install.packages ("ggthemes", dependencies =TRUE)
```
# load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library (ggthemes)
```
#import data
```{r}
exp1 = read_csv("exp1.csv")

nrow(exp1)
ncol(exp1)

colnames(exp1)

hist(exp1$rt)
```

# tidyverse verbs
```{r}
condition_data = 
exp1 %>% select(subject, rt, typeoftrial, trialcondition, correct) %>%
filter(typeoftrial == "picture" &
trialcondition %in% 
c("Heavy_Normal", "Light_Smashed", "Heavy_Smashed", "Light_Normal"))
3 %in% c(1,2,3)
3 %in% c(1,2,3) | 3>5
```
```{r}
exp1 %>% select(dataset, correct, typeoftrial) %>%
  filter(correct == 1 & typeoftrial == "picture")
```

```{r}
mean = 
condition_data %>%
  group_by(trialcondition) %>%
  summarize(mean_rt = mean(rt),
            sd_rt = sd(rt),
            mean_acc = mean(correct))
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
condition_data %>% 
  filter(rt < 10000) %>%
ggplot(aes(x = rt)) +
geom_histogram(binwidth = 1000, 
fill = "blue", color = "black", 
position = "identity")+
  theme_solarized()+
xlab("RT (in milliseconds)") + 
ylab ("Count")+
ggtitle("Histogram of RT")
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes) 
condition_data %>%
means %>% 
ggplot(aes(x = trialcondition, y = mean_rt)) +
geom_bar(stat = "identity")+
theme_fivethirtyeight()+
xlab("RT (in milliseconds)") + 
ylab ("Count")+
ggtitle("Barplot of RT")
```
